content.rendered:
Directed by Lynsey Miller. Niels Arden Oplev.

Written by Ben Schiffer.

Cast Ethan Kai (Mehmet Suleyman). Yasemin/Ep Kay Allen (Ayse Farsakoglu). Erol Afsin (Tarik Sanver). Deniz ÃœlkÃ¼ (Cicek Ikmen). Uygar Tamer (Fatma Ikmen). TÃ¼lin Oral. Dilan Gwyn (Leyla Pamuk). Selma ErgeÃ§ (Selma Payidar). Fatih Al (Ziver Bucar). Diyar Bozkurt (Izzet Melik). RÃ¼zgar Diricanli (Bekir Ikmen). Ferit Ozmenoglu (Yusuf Ikmen). Ruhi Sari (Emir). Murat Seven (Abdel Zahle). Lila GÃ¼rmen (Hulya). Yilmaz Gruda (Timur Ikmen). Nader Abd Alhay (Kemal Hadad). Thomas Chaanhing (Cai Ze Lop). Arif Erkin GÃ¼zelbeyoglu (Rifat). Dogan Baris Yasar (Alp). Martin Bruchmann (Jakob Kroos). Aziz Caner Inan (Soco Hasan). Ibrahim Alper Konukseven (Zeki). GÃ¼nes Sensoy (Godze Seren). Baris Kislak (Mesut). Yalim Danisman (Lokman Seren). Haydar Koyel (Cahit). Merve Conker Hicyilmaz (Mesut’s Maid). Sebnem Tumba Yildirim (Saadet).

Languages English. Turkish.

Producers Charles Croft. Marc Helwig. Ben Schiffer. Series Cinematography by. Philipp Haberlandt. Series Film Editing by. Ben Whitehead. Richard Graham. Nick Arthurs. Series Casting By. Sophie Holland.

Production Ay Yapim. Miramax Television. Miramax.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status On Going (2023–)
